name: Collage Doll #002 "Luna"
description:
Born in the dreamy silver-gray moonlight, Pia's sister was named Luna.
Luna was born with the attribute of "flower." Wherever she goes, even the most barren land can grow flowers that never fade. But she also is the prey of greedy people. Fortunately, her little Orc has a superbly sensitive sense of hearing and smell, which helps her hide her tracks.

皮娅的妹妹，在银白璀璨的月光下诞生，取名，露娜。
露娜天生拥有“花”的属性，她所到之处，即便是最贫瘠的土地，也能生长出花，永不凋零。但她也因此成为贪婪之人的猎物。幸运的是，她的小兽拥有超凡灵敏的听嗅觉，可以帮助她隐藏踪迹。
